game.name: Sovereign Call: Origins
game.shortDescription: Sovereign Call: Origins is a story-driven sci-fi RPG where your choices shape the fate of warring empires. Explore cinematic worlds, fight in fast-paced third-person combat, and decide the destiny of two protagonists caught in a galactic struggle.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sovereign Call: Origins is a story-driven sci-fi RPG where your choices shape the fate of warring empires. Explore cinematic worlds, fight in fast-paced third-person combat, and decide the destiny of two protagonists caught in a galactic struggle.
